page.title: 11HOUSING IN CANFORD MAGNA.
page.content: When Lord Wimborne built Canford House in Victorian days the village of Can- ford Magna grew up around it,though there are some newer houses there now. At Oakley Hill the Merley Way houses were built between the 1st.& 2nd.World Wars,but most of the other houses have been built during the last l5yrs,when there has been a big building prog- ramme & a complete alteration in the area.Nearly all owner-occupied,the modern houses are well planned and attractive.There is a small council estate in Selkirk Close which includes some property specially planned for old people.Near the small Oakley shopping centre is some terraced property,but mostly we have detached & semi-detached houses & bungalows.In nearly every dwelling either a garage or parking space is included.Gardens are well tended,bright & attractive.
